page.title: 03EDUCATION IN FENNY COMPTON:
page.content: {FENNY COMPTON SCHOOL}was founded in 1833,the present Headmaster being {W.H.STUBBINGS,}who has selected and typed the materials for this Survey. The {Parent-teachers Association } contributed the following:The school combines the charm of well maintained old buildings(1870)with an exceptional range of modern faciloties:four modern light & airy classrooms,a large Hall with stage & P.E.equipment,a spotless & well equipped kitchen,modern toilets & an Audio-visual room with TV,Video, projection & sound equipment, Micro- computer with disc drive & printer, a 4 acre Playing Field with football and hockey pitches,6 lane Sports Track,and well kept gardens.Children stay here to the age of 11, then transfer to Kineton High School,thence to College or University if they so qualify.We have swimming instruction in Summer.
